content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Magdeburg to be quite comfortable and convenient. Let's discuss the rental price. How much were you thinking of offering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to offer 300 Euro. This is a good price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 300 Euro is much lower than I was expecting. My apartment is brand new and in a prime location. I believe it's worth more than that. How about we start at 500 Euro?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too high for me. I'm a student and I don't have a lot of money. I could offer 400 Euro. This is a fair price for a one-bedroom apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your budget concerns, but 400 Euro is still below my asking price. The location of this apartment is very attractive, and it's a great opportunity for you to live in a modern, central place. Would you be willing to come closer to my initial offer of 500 Euro?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 450 Euro. This is a fair price for a one-bedroom apartment in Magdeburg. I hope you can accept my offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 450 Euro is still not enough for me to rent out my apartment. It's a great place, and I'm sure you'll appreciate the quality and convenience. Let's aim for a price that reflects the value of the apartment. How about 475 Euro?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we cannot agree on a rental price that suits both of us. Thank you for considering my offer.
[answered]
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand that we have different perspectives on the value of the apartment. If you feel that 475 Euro is not acceptable, then I respect your decision. Thank you for your time and for considering my property. We will not continue the negotiation at this time. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
